author: donaldp
msg: Remove redundent prefixing with this. and Namespace.

author: donaldp
msg: Update to use LogEnabled rather than Loggable where possible.
This means that internally the Phoenix container uses LogEnabled and only uses Loggable when a hosted block still uses the old format.
Eventually the old interface will be deprecated and removed.

Unfortunately this required a backwards incompatible change in BlockContext so that we return a org.apache.avalon.framework.logger.Logger rather than a org.apache.log.Logger. This should not effect a large proportion of users.

author: donaldp
msg: Update to latest versions of all the jars.

author: donaldp
